keys.<KW0>: To be replaced - Noun of novelty variations. Found in keys in dict_['keywords']
keys.<KW1>: To be replaced - Adjective of novelty variations. Found in value in dict_['keywords']
keys.<RECIPE_NAME>: To be replaced - Recipe Name - To define
keys.<COUNTRY_VAR>: To be replaced - Country different from the original one - To define
keys.<NATIONALITY_VAR>: To be replaced - Nationality different from the original one - To define
keys.<COUNTRY_ORIG>: To be replaced - Country of origin - To define
keys.<NATIONALITY_ORIG>: To be replaced - Nationality of origin - To define
keys.<DEFINITION>: To be replaced - definition of novel concepts - Found in value in dict_['novelty_definitions']

novelty_definitions.uniquness: This concept describes the rare or somewhat singular characteristics of an object or group of objects. It encapsulates the idea of a certain distance from an object's identity or its prototypical vision
novelty_definitions.newness: This concept describes the appearance of properties, terms or knowledge regarding an object that had never been observed or made public before in the application field of the object
novelty_definitions.difference: This concept describes the distance of an object from existing objects. The degree to which a design differs from those that have come before it
novelty_definitions.surprise: This concept describes a violation of someone's expectations. It can be regarded as a novelty in a space of expected designs or as a combination of attributes for an object rather than in a space of existing objects
